## Enterprise-Grade Updates

### Synditracker Hub (v1.0.6)
- Add centralized constants for configuration
- Add i18n text domain loading
- Add REST rate limiting (100 req/min per IP)
- Add aggregator whitelist validation
- Add /health endpoint for monitoring
- Add extensibility hooks throughout
- Improve DB error handling with logging
- Enhance Logger with configurable levels and rotation
- Update Admin class with full i18n
- Follow WordPress coding standards

### Synditracker Agent (v1.0.5)
- Add i18n text domain loading
- Add extensibility hooks
- Enhance Logger with levels and rotation
- Follow WordPress coding standards

### Installation
Download the appropriate zip file for your use case:
- **synditracker-1.0.6.zip** - Install on your main Hub site
- **synditracker-agent-1.0.5.zip** - Install on partner/syndication sites
